pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions module¶

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DEBest1(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/best/1

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DEBest2(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/best/2

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DECurrentToBest1(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/current-to-best/1

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DECurrentToPBest1(vector, population, F, CR, P)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/current-to-pbest/1

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DECurrentToRand1(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/current-to-rand/1

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DERand1(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/rand/1

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.DERand2(vector, population, F, CR)¶

Performs the differential evolution operator DE/rand/2

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.blxalpha(vector1, vector2, alpha)¶

Performs the BLX alpha crossing operator between two vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.cauchy(vector, strength)¶

Adds random noise following a Cauchy distribution to the vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.cross1p(vector1, vector2)¶

Performs a 1 point cross between two vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.cross2p(vector1, vector2)¶

Performs a 2 point cross between two vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.crossInterAvg(vector, population, n_ind)¶

Performs an intermediate average crossover between the vector and ‘n-1’ individuals the population

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.crossMp(vector1, vector2)¶

Performs a multipoint cross between two vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.dummyOp(vector, scale=1000)¶

Replaces the vector with one consisting of all the same value

Only for testing, not useful for real applications

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.firefly(solution, population, objfunc, alpha_0, beta_0, delta, gamma)¶

Performs a step of the Firefly algorithm

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.gaussian(vector, strength)¶

Adds random noise following a Gaussian distribution to the vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.laplace(vector, strength)¶

Adds random noise following a Laplace distribution to the vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.multiCross(vector, population, n_ind)¶

Performs a multipoint cross between the vector and ‘n-1’ individuals of the population

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.mutateRand(vector, population, params)¶

Adds random noise with a given probability distribution to ‘n’ components of the input vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.mutateSample(vector, population, params)¶

Replaces ‘n’ components of the input vector with a random value sampled from a given probability distribution.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.mutate_1_sigma(sigma, epsilon, tau)¶

Mutate a sigma value in base of tau param, where epsilon is de minimum value that a sigma can have.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.mutate_n_sigmas(list_sigmas, epsilon, tau, tau_multiple)¶

Mutate a list of sigmas values in base of tau and tau_multiple params, where epsilon is de minimum value that a sigma can have.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.permutation(vector, n)¶

Randomly permutes ‘n’ of the components of the input vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.poisson(vector, mu)¶

Adds random noise following a Poisson distribution to the vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.pso_operator(indiv, population, global_best, w, c1, c2)¶

Performs a step of the Particle Swarm algorithm

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.randNoise(vector, params)¶

Adds random noise with a given probability distribution to all components of the input vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.randSample(vector, population, params)¶

Picks a vector with components sampled from a probability distribution.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.sampleDistribution(method, n, mean=0, strength=0.01, low=0, up=1)¶

Takes ‘n’ samples from a given probablility distribution and returns them as a vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.sample_1_sigma(vector, n, epsilon, tau)¶

Replaces ‘n’ components of the input vector with a value sampled from the mutate 1 sigma function.

In future, it should be integrated in mutateSample and sampleDistribution functions, considering np.exp(tau * N(0,1)) as a distribution function with a min value of epsilon.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.sbx(vector1, vector2, strength)¶

Performs the SBX crossing operator between two vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.uniform(vector, low, up)¶

Adds random noise following an Uniform distribution to the vector.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.weightedAverage(vector1, vector2, alpha)¶

Performs a weighted average between the two given vectors

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.xorCross(vector1, vector2)¶

Applies the XOR operation between each component of the input vectors.

pyevolcomp.Operators.vector_operator_functions.xorMask(vector, n, mode='byte')¶

Applies an XOR operation between a random number and the input vector.
